message:
eat: Add systematic framework post for /MGC trading

Adds a new in-depth article titled "A Systematic Framework for Trading Micro Gold (/MGC) Futures".

This post provides a comprehensive, rule-based framework for traders. It deconstructs the /MGC contract, outlines a top-down analytical model using price action, and details a multi-indicator toolkit (Volume Profile, VWAP, ATR). It concludes with a rule-based trading plan and notes on psychological discipline.
author: mkahveci

message:
feat: Implement filtered content and expanded course page

Introduce may-filtered content on pages for courses, blog posts, and
publications to enhance relevance.

Expand the PHYS course page to include course materials organized by due
dates for better student access.

Rework blog post tags using advanced content analysis for improved
categorization.
author: mkahveci

message:
feat: Display filtered trade list and improve load efficiency

Update trade-ideas.md to show a filtered list of trades, defaulting to today's trades. Also, improve page load efficiency by limiting the initial display to the last 50 trades.

Rename reading.md title to "Readings & Documentation".

message:
Feat: Implement and document new ELL Content Modification Templates

This commit adds structured documentation for a suite of AI templates designed to scaffold content for English Language Learners (ELLs) across various high school subjects (Physics, Chemistry, Biology, ELA, Math, Forensics, Spanish, Theater Arts).

The documentation also includes the Socratic Chemistry Tutor and the Learning Target Helper, centralizing tools for differentiated instruction and formative learning cycles. Templates follow the REACH proficiency scale.
author: mkahveci
